simplified_approach.description: Simplified OCR using only Google Vision + Gemini for immediate data structuring

google_vision.reason: High-quality cloud OCR with Google Vision API

gemini.reason: Immediate data structuring and validation with Gemini AI

tesseract.reason: Replaced by simplified approach - Google Vision provides better accuracy

easy_ocr.reason: Replaced by simplified approach - redundant with Google Vision

paddle_ocr.reason: Replaced by simplified approach - was using fallback anyway

azure_computer_vision.reason: Replaced by simplified approach - Google Vision is sufficient
